bytebase.store.DimensionalConfig.jsonsch.description: DimensionalConfig defines dimensional and constraint parameters for spatial indexes.

dataType.description:
Spatial data type
 Examples: GEOMETRY, GEOGRAPHY, POINT, POLYGON, etc.

layerGtype.description:
Oracle geometry type constraint
 Examples: POINT, LINE, POLYGON, COLLECTION

operatorClass.description:
PostgreSQL operator class
 Examples: gist_geometry_ops_2d, gist_geometry_ops_nd, etc.

bytebase.store.DimensionalConfig.jsonsch.title: Dimensional Config
